main event: Three civilians observed three elongated, cigar-shaped objects in the sky over Billings, Montana.
interesting points: The objects were thinner and longer than cigars and moved in a loose group., Observers initially saw one stationary object followed by two others that left a vapor-like trail., The sighting lasted for about 1 hour and 10 minutes., The objects moved south at a moderate speed after circling and joining each other., Clear weather conditions were reported at the time of the observation.
